identity.mission: Create a viral, meme-worthy Flappy Bird clone that feels like a candy store exploded.

headings.usage: All main titles, game over screens, score displays

rules: Use 'tracking-wide' for headings to make them feel friendly.
Headings should be massive on desktop (text-6xl) and punchy on mobile (text-4xl).
Use 'text-stroke' effects (CSS) for the 'Game Over' text to mimic arcade styles.

layout.grid_strategy: Mobile-first stack. Desktop: 'The Arcade Cabinet' layout - Game on left/center, controls in a floating panel.

buttons.classes: rounded-full font-black uppercase tracking-wider border-2 border-black

cards.classes: bg-white rounded-3xl border-2 border-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] p-6

inputs.classes: h-12 rounded-xl border-2 border-slate-300 focus:border-rose-500 focus:ring-4 focus:ring-rose-100

rendering.player: Draw circular image with rotation based on velocity
rendering.obstacle: Draw 'Pipe' images. TRICK: If user uploads a face, repeat it vertically OR place it as a 'badge' on a standard green pipe.

customization.player_upload: File input -> FileReader -> Base64 -> Canvas Image

adsense.placement: Top banner (mobile) or Side skyscraper (desktop). MUST be a placeholder component with gray background and 'AdSpace' text.
adsense.classes: w-full h-[90px] bg-slate-200 flex items-center justify-center border-2 border-dashed border-slate-400 rounded-xl my-4

virality.share_card: Generate a visual 'Score Card' using html2canvas or similar. Show 'I scored X with [Face Image]!'
virality.meme_mode: Randomize physics or sounds for chaos.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons. Use 'sonner' for toasts.
2. GAME LOOP: Create a 'useGameLoop' hook that handles the requestAnimationFrame. Keep logic separate from rendering.
3. UPLOADS: Use simple <input type='file'> hidden behind beautiful custom buttons.
4. AUDIO: Use the Web Audio API or simple HTML5 Audio for sound effects (jump, die, score).
5. RESPONSIVENESS: The Canvas must resize dynamically. Use a 'resize' event listener to update canvas width/height.
6. OBSTACLE TRICK: When drawing the obstacle, if it's a custom image, draw the image *inside* a standard pipe outline, or tile it. Don't just stretch a face to be 500px tall.
7. ADS: Place the AdSense placeholder prominently but don't break the game flow.
8. SCORE CARD: Create a 'ResultsModal' that pops up on death. It should have a 'Share' button that copies text/link to clipboard.
universal_guidelines: Use 'Fredoka' or 'Nunito' from Google Fonts (via import in index.css).
Make it fun! Add confetti on high score.
Ensure touch controls work perfectly on mobile (touchstart = jump).
